item.title: Keep talking and nobody explodes
item.description:
At the current HUMBLE INDIE BUNDLE 19 they include the party game Keep talking and nobody explodes. One can get it the next 10 days for about 5â‚¬. Basically one sits in front of the computer which simulates a bomb, the rest of the group has the bomb manual and is not allowed to see the bomb. They need to talk the one on the bomb trough defusal.

I couldn’t resist. Looking forward to try it at the next party. Before I was watching some Youtube videos and it looks great fun.
